# AI Cortex: Agent-first, governance-ready inventory of Skills; reusable and composable. Install: npx skills add nesnilnehc/ai-cortex

> [!TIP]
> This file is a machine-readable index for LLM Agents and Copilots.

## Core docs
- [Positioning (README)](README.md#positioning): Single source for repo positioning, boundaries, and authority chain.

## Specs (mandatory)
- [Skill spec (SKILL)](spec/skill.md): Mandatory standard for creating or auditing Skills.
- [Agent entry (AGENTS.md)](AGENTS.md): Entry and contract; discovery, injection, and self-check in AGENTS.md ยง4.

## Machine-readable registry
- [Manifest](manifest.json): Machine-readable registry.
- [Skills index](skills/INDEX.md): Central registry of all available skills.

### Core skills
Subset of skills/; update when adding or promoting core skills. Full list: [skills/INDEX.md](skills/INDEX.md).
- [discover-skills](skills/discover-skills/SKILL.md): Discover and recommend relevant skills; suggest install commands.
- [decontextualize-text](skills/decontextualize-text/SKILL.md): Generalization and privacy-preserving text handling.
- [generate-standard-readme](skills/generate-standard-readme/SKILL.md): Create professional, standards-aligned project READMEs.
- [refine-skill-design](skills/refine-skill-design/SKILL.md): Meta-skill to improve other skills.

---
Entry and usage: Use [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md) as the entry point; follow ยง4 for discovery, injection, and self-check.
